# Spotly: The Spotify Clone.
Uses PHP and PDO. This is a project that I will be dedicated to.<br>For education purposes, please check for vulnerabilities and report them!<br>Spotly needs PHP version 8.1.21+ to work.<br>You can use: https://www.ct8.pl/ or https://serv00.net/ for completely free.
## What will Spotly do.
First of all, I will be making an official Web Client with C# in Visual Studio.<br>It will also use RichPrescence, and no account will be needed to listen to music for free!<br>Playlists won't be a thing until' I can get things right.
## Is Spotly FULLY Open Source?
Yep. Spotly will be 95% Open Source.<br>Just make sure to credit me :3<br>By credit I mean like: ![Source creator](https://img.shields.io/badge/source%20code%20creator-%231DA1F2.svg?&style=plastic&logo=github&logoColor=white)<br>All Spotly Pro features aren't open source.<br>(Thats why when Spotly Open Source gets released /pro/ and /api/pro/ won't exist.)
## Spotly Checklist:
- [ ] Uploading
- [ ] PDO Intergration
- [ ] Listening
- [ ] Rich Prescence
- [ ] Web Client
- [ ] PC Client
- [ ] App Client
- [ ] Spotly Bot for Discord
- [ ] Profiles
- [ ] Playlists
- [ ] Security
- [ ] Admin Panel
- [ ] Banning
- [ ] Spotly Pro: 2 playlists to 10 playlists (to avoid sql overflow) [Spotly
- [ ] Spotly Pro: Timeout limit decreased (example: Playlist Creation: 7 days -> 1 day, PFP change: 3 days -> 1 day.)
- [ ] Checkout System
- [ ] Verification
- [ ] 2FA
- [ ] Email Verification
